Title: Astérix and Obélix: God Save Britannia
Writer: René Goscinny (comic book), Laurent Tirard (scenario & adaptation), Albert Uderzo (comic book), Grégoire Vigneron (scenario & adaptation), Grégoire Vigneron (screenplay)
Actors: Gérard Depardieu, Edouard Baer, Guillaume Gallienne, Vincent Lacoste
Plot: Asterix crosses the channel to help second-cousin Anticlimax face down Julius Caesar and invading Romans.
Production: Fidélité Films, Lucky Red, Wild Bunch, Morena Films S.L.
